tool_description: Monitors and analyzes public sentiment around specific topics across social media platforms to identify sentiment trends and public opinion shifts.

topics.description: Topics or keywords to monitor sentiment for

platform.description: Platform for sentiment analysis (twitter, instagram, facebook, reddit, youtube)

sample_size.description: Number of posts to analyze per topic (100-5000)

language.description: Language for sentiment analysis (en, es, fr, de, it, pt)

error_messages: Empty topics array: Provide at least one topic for sentiment analysis.
Too many topics: Maximum 8 topics allowed for accurate analysis.
Unsupported platform: Use one of [twitter, instagram, facebook, reddit, youtube].
Invalid sample size: Must be between 100 and 5000.
Unsupported language: Use one of [en, es, fr, de, it, pt].
Insufficient data: Not enough posts found for reliable sentiment analysis.
usage: Provide topics array, platform, and timeframe. Optionally specify sample_size and language. Returns sentiment analysis with trends and key insights.

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) for each topic

sentiment_scores.description: Numerical sentiment scores (-1 to 1) for each topic

trending_direction.description: Sentiment trend direction (improving, declining, stable) for each topic

key_themes.description: Main themes driving sentiment for each topic
